meanings.definition: A gonad containing both ovarian and testicular tissue.

meanings.sent2: The ovotestes of the seahorse allow it to change gender.
meanings.sent3: The ovotestes in the biology lab were a fascinating subject for the students.

meanings.definition: An organ that combines the functions of both ovaries and testes.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained the benefits of the ovotestes to the patient.
meanings.sent2: The ovotestes in the fish allow it to reproduce in a unique way.
meanings.sent3: The ovotestes costume at the party was a hilarious sight.
